title: System Monitor
text: Stay in control of your development environment with One Dev's System Monitor feature. Effortlessly track CPU usage, memory consumption, and disk activity in real-time.

section.title: Resources
section.content: Access system resource information at a glance. Monitor CPU usage, memory usage, and more. Stay informed about your system's performance to optimize your development environment.

section.title: Processes
section.content: Effortlessly manage and monitor running processes on your system.

section.title: File Systems
section.content: Explore and manage your file systems.
